Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.24.2 32bit windows 7

Problem: Trying to open my craft saves in the SPH

Mods installed:

Environmental and visual enhancements

Hyperedit

Space Plane Plus

Raster Prop

Texture Replacer

Kerb Cam

Reproduction steps:

Entering the SPH and trying to click on the folder and it is not opening. It is only happening in 1 of my save files.

Log:
I had a similar issue loading craft when SelectRoot was installed.

I had a similar issue loading craft when SelectRoot was installed.

I dont think i have that mod but i made a new save and its all fine. It is a weird bug.

I....don't see a log.

Also, we need the *versions* of those mods, as that will narrow things down. Speaking of narrowing things down, please find the *minimum* set of mods that causes the issue.

Please follow the guidelines; you're close, but it's missing some very necessary stuff.
